title: Customer Picks Up BOPIS Order
description: A customer arrives in-store to pick up their 'Buy Online, Pick up In Store' order.

tasks.description: The customer provides their name or order number to the store associate.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate has the information needed to find the order.

tasks.description: The associate looks up the order in the POS or handheld device to find its staging location.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system shows the order is in 'Staging Bin C'.

tasks.description: The associate retrieves the order, has the customer sign for it, and marks the order as 'Completed' in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer receives their order, and the transaction is finalized.
